snippet: McCartney's collection contained quirky monogrammed separates, buffalo checks and dazzling brocade dresses.
abstract: McCartney's collection contained quirky monogrammed separates, buffalo checks and dazzling brocade dresses.
lead_paragraph: The suit from Stella McCartney this season is a bit of a departure from the one she's best known for, with its soft-edged, single-button jacket. The prefall suit has three buttons and is "much more fitted, tailored and body-conscious," said McCartney at last night's presentation. "I'm always designing for women, things they'll want to wear." Chances are, much of the collection -- including the quirky monogrammed separates, the green and black buffalo checks (shown here) and the dazzling brocade dresses -- will be on that list, too.
